英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for the Application of Designated Professional Institutions for Building Precast Rate Evaluation
中文法規名稱: 申請指定建築物預鑄率評定專業機構規費收費標準
沿革內容: 1.Formulated & published under MOI Order Tai-Nei-Jian-Yan-Tzu No. 1137636293 on Aug. 1, 2024

法規內容.條文內容: This standard is established in accordance with the provisions of Paragraph 1 of Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
Applicants for the designated professional institution for assessing the building precast rate of specific building shall pay a fee of NT$15,000 per application.
After the fee specified in the preceding article has been paid, any overpayment or erroneous payment shall be handled in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Charges and Fees Act.
This standard shall take effect from the date of its promulgation.
